expansioncontent:GuardianWhirl.NAME: Guardian Whirl
expansioncontent:GuardianWhirl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL If you have at least !DM! Block, hits !M! more times.

expansioncontent:Hexaburn.NAME: Hexaburn
expansioncontent:Hexaburn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Exhaust.
expansioncontent:Hexaburn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

expansioncontent:InvincibleStrength.NAME: Invincible
expansioncontent:InvincibleStrength.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! expansioncontent:Invincible. NL If you already had expansioncontent:Invincible, it lasts another turn instead.

expansioncontent:HyperBeam.NAME: Automa-Beam
expansioncontent:HyperBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Place a *Void on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:LastStand.NAME: Last Stand
expansioncontent:LastStand.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Debuffs. NL Gain !M! Strength.

expansioncontent:YouAreMine.NAME: YOU ARE MINE!
expansioncontent:YouAreMine.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak, !M! Vulnerable, and !DM! expansioncontent:Doom to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:AwakenDeath.NAME: Curiosity
expansioncontent:AwakenDeath.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power, gain !M! Strength.

expansioncontent:Chronoboost.NAME: Chrono-Boost
expansioncontent:Chronoboost.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength for every 12th card you play.

expansioncontent:SuperPrepareCrush.NAME: Prepare Crush
expansioncontent:SuperPrepareCrush.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain *SLIME *CRUSH, [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.
expansioncontent:SuperPrepareCrush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain *SLIME *CRUSH+, [E] [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:SuperLivingWall.NAME: Living Wall
expansioncontent:SuperLivingWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! expansioncontent:Goop to attackers this turn.

expansioncontent:StudyTheSpire.NAME: Study the Spire
expansioncontent:StudyTheSpire.DESCRIPTION: Gain a random *Boss card at the start of your next !M! turns. They cost 0.
expansioncontent:StudyTheSpire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain a random Upgraded *Boss at the start of your next !M! turns. They cost 0.

expansioncontent:QuickStudy.NAME: Quick Study
expansioncontent:QuickStudy.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 *Boss cards to gain. NL It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.
expansioncontent:QuickStudy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Upgraded *Boss cards to gain. NL It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:DashGenerateEvil.NAME: The Evil Within
expansioncontent:DashGenerateEvil.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply !DM! debuffs, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

expansioncontent:KnowingSkullWish.NAME: Knowing Skull
expansioncontent:KnowingSkullWish.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Spend HP to *Wish *for *Souls, *Potions, or a *Colorless card. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:SuperGoopSpray.NAME: Goop Spray
expansioncontent:SuperGoopSpray.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! expansioncontent:Goop and !DM! Weak to ALL enemies.

expansioncontent:ChargeUp.NAME: Resilient Plate
expansioncontent:ChargeUp.DESCRIPTION: Reduce each of your debuffs by !M!. NL Exhaust.
expansioncontent:ChargeUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce each of your debuffs by !M!.

expansioncontent:SuperTaunt.NAME: Taunt
expansioncontent:SuperTaunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

expansioncontent:Torchfire.NAME: Wildfire
expansioncontent:Torchfire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each unique debuff on the enemy.

expansioncontent:TakeFlight.NAME: Revitalize
expansioncontent:TakeFlight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! expansioncontent:Regen. NL expansioncontent:Chant: Gain !DM! *Regen instead.

expansioncontent:BeatOfDeath.NAME: Beat Of Death
expansioncontent:BeatOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

expansioncontent:SuperClobber.NAME: Clobbering Strike
expansioncontent:SuperClobber.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

expansioncontent:SuperSomberShield.NAME: Somber Shield
expansioncontent:SuperSomberShield.DESCRIPTION: expansioncontent:Pyre. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain a copy of the *Exhausted card.

expansioncontent:SuperWhirlingFlame.NAME: Whirling Flame
expansioncontent:SuperWhirlingFlame.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

expansioncontent:Flail.NAME: Flail
expansioncontent:Flail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !DM! times. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:SuperBloodthirst.NAME: Bloodthirst
expansioncontent:SuperBloodthirst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, obtain a random potion and Exhaust this card.

expansioncontent:SuperBodyCrash.NAME: Body Crash
expansioncontent:SuperBodyCrash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal damage equal to your Block.

expansioncontent:SuperEtherStep.NAME: Ether Step
expansioncontent:SuperEtherStep.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL Draw !M! card. NL Deal !D! damage.
expansioncontent:SuperEtherStep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Deal !D! damage.

expansioncontent:Virus.NAME: Virus
expansioncontent:Virus.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards, shuffle a *Major *Beam into the draw pile for each card exhausted. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:ManipulateTime.NAME: Afterthought
expansioncontent:ManipulateTime.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile to the bottom of your draw pile. It costs 0 until played.
expansioncontent:ManipulateTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile to the bottom of your draw pile. It costs 0 this combat.

expansioncontent:Pandemonium.NAME: Pandemonium
expansioncontent:Pandemonium.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a random card in your discard pile.

expansioncontent:Reverie.NAME: Reverie
expansioncontent:Reverie.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, put one of the top !M! cards of your discard pile into your hand.

expansioncontent:ExploitVulnerability.NAME: Donu Beam
expansioncontent:ExploitVulnerability.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy, then gain that much Block. NL Deal !D! damage twice.

expansioncontent:PeekPages.NAME: Peek Pages
expansioncontent:PeekPages.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! *Insights into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:DoubleAct.NAME: Double Act
expansioncontent:DoubleAct.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next turn, draw cards and gain [E] an additional time. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:BloodySacrifice.NAME: Bloody Sacrifice
expansioncontent:BloodySacrifice.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Lose !M! % of your Max HP. NL Gain 1 Ritual. Exhaust.
